name: sonority
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of having a deep, pleasant sound, or the degree to which something has this sound: The kind of intense sonority generated by the orchestra is just what's needed to remind you what meaning the piece can have. The two instruments are not of equal sonority.
More examplesFewer examplesHarmony and sonority drive this music.I chose this word for its sonority initially.Then it was time for some good vibrations, from whistling string harmonies to extreme sonorities.
